wand.name: digging
wand.engrave: This [wand] is a wand of digging
wand.zap: The beam bounces off the [stairs] and hits the [ceiling]
You loosen a rock from the [ceiling]. It falls on your [head]
The [floor] here is too hard to dig in
The [hrone/altar] is too hard to break apart
The pipes break! Water spurts out
Water gushes forth from the overflowing fountain
The [water] sloshes furiously for a moment, then subside
You are blown apart by flying debris
You are hit by a huge chunk of metal
The boulder settles into the pit
The boulder settles into the pit
You dig a pit in the grav
You hear something crash through the [floor]
[Monster] has made a hole in the [floor]

wand.name: locking
wand.zap: A trap door beneath you closes up then vanishes
ou see a swirl of [dust] beneath you
You hear a twang followed by a thud
A cloud of dust springs up in the older, more primitive doorway
A cloud of dust springs up and assembles itself into a door
The broken door reassembles and locks
The door swings shut and locks

wand.name: magic missile
wand.engrave: The [floor] is riddled by bullet holes
wand.zap: The magic missile rips into the [monster]

wand.name: make invisible
wand.zap: You feel rather itchy under your [mummy wrapping]
Gee! All of a sudden, you can't see yourself
Gee! All of a sudden, you can see right through yourself
Far out, man! You can't see yourself
Far out, man! You can see right through yourself
[Monster]'s body takes on a strange transparency
[Monster]'s body takes on a normal transparency

wand.name: opening
wand.zap: You feel a sudden rush of air
The stairs seem to ripple momentarily
You see a drawbridge going down
You are crushed underneath the drawbridge
A door appears in the wall
Your chain quivers for a moment

wand.name: probing
wand.zap: You probe towards the [ceiling]. Your probe reveals nothing

wand.name: slow monster
wand.engrave: The bugs on the [floor] slow down
wand.zap: You disrupt [monster]! A huge hole opens up...

wand.name: speed monster
wand.engrave: The bugs on the [floor] speed up

wand.name: striking
wand.engrave: The wand unsuccessfully fights your attempt to write
wand.zap: A rock is dislodged from the ceiling and falls on your [head]
A door appears in the wall
KABOOM!! You see a door explode
Instead of shattering, the statue suddenly comes alive
Instead of shattering, the statue suddenly disappears

wand.name: undead turning
wand.zap: [Ghost] is suddenly drawn into its former body
You feel frightened and even more stunned

wands.wand: cold 175 8 4% ray' A few ice cubes drop from the wand The bolt of cold rips into the [monster] The bolt of cold hits the [monster] You imitate a popsicle You feel a little chill The water freezes The moat is bridged with ice You hear a crackling [sound] The water freezes for a moment You hear a soft crackling The lava cools and solidifies The door freezes and shatters You feel cold You don't feel cold

wand.name: fire
wand.engrave: This [wand] is a wand of fire
wand.zap: The door is consumed in flames
You see a puff of smoke
You smell a whiff of smoke
Strangely, you feel better than before

wand.name: lightning
wand.engrave: This [wand] is a wand of lightning
wand.zap: The bolt of lightning rips into the [monster]
The bolt of lightning hits the [monster]
You zap yourself, but seem unharmed
Strangely, you feel better than before
You are blinded by the flash
Strangely, you feel better than before
You are blinded by the flash

wand.name: sleep
wand.engrave: The bugs on the [floor] stop moving
wand.zap: The sleep ray rips into the [monster]

wand.name: cancellation
wand.zap: Some writing vanishes from your head
Your amulet grows hot for a moment, then cools

wand.name: teleportation
wand.zap: You are no longer inside the [monster]
A mysterious force prevents you from teleporting
You feel disoriented for a moment
A mysterious force prevents [monster] from teleporting

wand.name: death
wand.engrave: The bugs on the [floor] stop moving
wand.zap: The death ray rips into the [monster]
The wand shoots an apparently harmless beam at you
You irradiate yourself with pure energy! You die
